transcript: one of the easiest ways to break a belief is be around people who are making significantly more than you because what you find out is that they are made of the same thing as you same flesh same bones same brain sometimes you meet them and you're like how is this guy doing it and rather than WR off this guy's such an idiot think despite him being an idiot he's still more successful than me imagine if I used my work ethic and my intelligence on the same lessons that this guy obviously has right and when I shifted my perspective from that way I was able to start using other people's successes to fuel me rather than to make me feel bad
